attributes.action: extend off peak free travel for the over sixties to cover the whole of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To give over sixties the opportunity to visit parts of the UK that could be financially out of their reach.(The trains / buses / trams etc are running anyway)Lets use them. 
Travelling on public transport would also reduce the number of vehicles on our roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
